name: Unexpected Return at Dawn
ability: Choose 2 cards in your hand. Your opponent may make you reveal those cards. If your opponent does not, choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. If your opponent does, and the revealed cards are a character with "Karen(華恋)" in its card name and a character with "Hikari(ひかり)" in its card name, choose up to 3 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. If the revealed cards are not, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text:
Mahiru: "Karen-chan!"
Hikari: "We ran out of money…"

name: Towards the Light
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Even so, Karen and I…

name: The Stage Continues Nonetheless
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text:
Karen: "Let's do it, Hikari-chan!"
Hikari: "Mm!"

name: Where the Shine Is
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: My Very Own Star, Junna Hoshimi
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Revue》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: We have to give our all and reach for the stars… Right?

name: Brave Readiness, Maya Tendo
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Noble Will, Claudine Saijo" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When this card attacks, if "The Show Must Go On" is in your climax area, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Position Zero... This is Tendo Maya!

name: Noble Will, Claudine Saijo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Brave Readiness, Maya Tendo", look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "The Show Must Go On" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Brave Readiness, Maya Tendo" in the middle position of your center stage, and 【STAND】 it.

name: My Own Shine, Claudine Saijo
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room]When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: ?a commence!

name: Pajama Party, Maya Tendo
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.

name: My Own Shine, Maya Tendo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck in any order.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card’s battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: There is but one star that shines above all.

name: My Own Shine, Junna Hoshimi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revue》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to your hand. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: I won't give up! I am a Stage Girl!

name: Ready to Challenge the Stage, Claudine Saijo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "To Greater Heights" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Prim and Proper Rep, Junna Hoshimi
ability: 【CONT】 If there are 2 or less climax in your waiting room, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Night of the Star Festival" is in your climax area, and "Prim and Proper Rep, Junna Hoshimi" is in the middle position of your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 4 cards from among them, put them into your opponent's waiting room, return the rest to your opponent's deck, your opponent shuffles his or her deck, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You need to start waking up on your own!

name: Achieving the Highest Star, Junna Hoshimi
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Revue》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Devote yourself to achieving your highest star!!

name: Stage Girl's Summer, Claudine Saijo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revue》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Revue Duet, Maya Tendo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Leotard Junna & Mahiru
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Revue》 characters and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and that 《Revue》 character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.

name: The Next Starlight, Maya Tendo

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revue》 character, you may put it face up underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Revenge, Junna Hoshimi
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Leading Role of Fate" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, and you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, you may choose 1 level 1 or lower character on your opponent's back stage, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card’s battle opponent is higher than your opponent’s level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Precious Memories, Junna Hoshimi
